page.title: 08Wareham Housing.
page.content: Houses most in demand are small,2 to 3 bedroomed houses under Â£40,000 and first floor flats for elderly.Some houses are turned into holiday homes. Young married couples need houses at Â£25_30,000 and later progress to larger accomodation.This is a problem because of a shortage of suitable priced houses.Ensors get about 4 to 5 thousand enquiries a year but only 100 to 200 houses are purchased.Most of the applications are from outside Wareham,from people trying to move into a house in a more rural area. Ensors find that most of their customers are satisfied with their range of properties for sale in the area.
